name: prawns pil pil
ingredients: Olive oil (enough to cover the bottom of the dish)
steps: In a clay skillet (or an oven-safe dish), pour the olive oil. Add the chopped garlic cloves and chili.
Saut√© the garlic and chili in the oil until the garlic is golden (be careful not to burn it).
Add the prawns to the skillet. Cook them, stirring occasionally, until they turn pink and are cooked through (a few minutes).
Add salt. Transfer to a serving dish. Serve very hot, with bread to dip in the spicy oil.
